kv6.6:1.3: Nibbānaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ saraṇaṃ parāyanaṃ accutaṃ amatanti?
kv6.6:3.1: ☑ Ākāse pakkhino gacchanti, candimasūriyā gacchanti, tārakarūpāni gacchanti, iddhiṃ vikubbanti, bāhuṃ cālenti, pāṇiṃ cālenti, leḍḍuṃ khipanti, laguḷaṃ khipanti, iddhiṃ khipanti, usuṃ khipantīti?
kv6.6:3.3: Asaṅkhate pakkhino gacchanti, candimasūriyā gacchanti, tārakarūpāni gacchanti, iddhiṃ vikubbanti, bāhuṃ cālenti, pāṇiṃ cālenti, leḍḍuṃ khipanti, laguḷaṃ khipanti, iddhiṃ khipanti, usuṃ khipantīti?
kv6.6:4.1: ☑ Ākāsaṃ parivāretvā gharāni karonti koṭṭhāni karontīti?
kv6.6:4.3: Asaṅkhataṃ parivāretvā gharāni karonti koṭṭhāni karontīti?
kv6.6:6.1: ☑ Tucchaudapāne pūriyamāne, tucchakoṭṭhe pūriyamāne, tucchakumbhiyā pūriyamānāya ākāso antaradhāyatīti?
